name: Thank You NHS
author: Andrew Chadwick, Success Local Limited

sections.description:
This plugin allows users to show their support to the NHS and keyworkers by displaying a banner on the website, as well as a rainbow cursor.
If you would like to donate to NHS Charities Together and show your appreciation to all the staff in the NHS and all other keyworkers then please visit our JustGiving page and give anything you can.
Stay at home. Save lives. Protect the NHS.
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Thank You NHS’
  3. Activate from your Plugins page.

Manually

  1. Upload the thank-you-nhs folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can I donate and support the NHS and key workers?

Visit our JustGiving page at https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/sl-plugin-donation to make a donation.

short_description: Adding a rainbow cursor and banner to your site to spread hope and say thank you to the NHS and key workers.
